settings.heading: Holiday Gift Guides
settings.text: Are you looking for a sexy gift to inspire intimacy, self-care, and pleasure? Our team of sex educators are here to guide you through your sexy holiday gift shopping experience. Check out these shopping guides, curated by our team to help you pick the perfect sex toy gift for a special someone on your list!

settings.heading: Stocking Stuffers: Best Sex Toy Gifts Under $30
settings.text: Shop our favorite sex toys, books, games, and more, all under $30. In this guide we'll help you choose a thoughtful and pleasurable gift within your budget!

settings.heading: Come Together: Best Gifts for Partner Play
settings.text: Any sex toy can be used alone or with a partner, but some are designed specifically for mutual pleasure! We'll help you choose a gift that gives back with in our guide to best sex toys for partner play.

settings.heading: Simple Pleasures: Best Sex Toy Gifts Under $50
settings.text: Want to give the gift of pleasure without breaking the bank? Our guide to the best sex toy gifts under $50 goes way beyond stocking stuffers, bringing you power, quality, and versatility at an affordable price!

settings.heading: Self Care Season: Best Sex Toy Gifts for Solo Play
settings.text: Give them a gift that shows you're invested in their self-love, pleasure, and self-care. Check out our guide to the best sexy gifts for solo play and self-care.

settings.heading: Unwrap Luxury: Best Luxury Sex Toy Gifts
settings.text: Does your special someone have a penchant for the finer things in life? We've pulled together a selection of our favorite high-end sex toys. Learn more about what makes a luxury toy and how to choose the right one!

settings.heading: New Year, New Toys
settings.text: Refresh your toybox for the new year - or shop for someone who has it all! In this guide we'll recommend some of the hottest and trending new sex toys so you can resolve for more pleasure!
